page.title: 13SHOPPING IN GRETTON
page.content: For a small village, shopping facilities in Gretton are very good. It has four shops - the Cooperative Store, Post Office, a hairdresser's and a newsagent's. The Cooperative sells a large variety of household goods such as food, sweets, canned goods and washing powders. The Post Office is also a general store selling a smaller range of foodstuffs and stationery. The newsagent's sells many lines other than papers and stationery. There are also three vans which deliver around the village during the week - a butcher with a large selection of meats, a grocer selling greengrocery in addition to the usual lines and a baker with a choice of bread.
